channel.title: Some Gofa fegging ddos'ed me from im guessing rs-server
channel.description:
ok i got banned from rs-server the other day for sending gander a pm saying sorry for all the shit i caused between you and xero (i wasnt really sorry i hate him)
anyhow i get banned
reason: go away
next i make another account called thebanie send him a message asking why he banned me and please unban me
banned
reason: fat chance
next i make 1 more account and send a pm to kevin asking him if he can talk to Faggot gander
i get:
it was his decision
5 min later
banned
reason: banned by request (gander) sorry
next i wake up next morning and internets off i restart the router... nothing even my dads went of
so im guessing someone ddos'ed me from rs-server
we still havent sorted it. im on my fathers pc thats on a diferent modem
anyhow to the point:
i wont be on for a couple of days hopefully less
but rest assured, there gonna get whats coming to em

item.title: Some Gofa fegging ddos'ed me from im guessing rs-server

@whothe0 wrote:

[quote=“Thebeanie, post:1, topic:18503”]ok i got banned from rs-server the other day for sending gander a pm saying sorry for all the shit i caused between you and xero (i wasnt really sorry i hate him)

anyhow i get banned

reason: go away

next i make another account called thebanie send him a message asking why he banned me and please unban me

banned

reason: fat chance

next i make 1 more account and send a pm to kevin asking him if he can talk to Faggot gander

i get:

it was his decision

5 min later

banned

reason: banned by request (gander) sorry

next i wake up next morning and internets off
i restart the router… nothing even my dads went of

so im guessing someone ddos’ed me from rs-server

we still havent sorted it. im on my fathers pc thats on a diferent modem

anyhow to the point:

i wont be on for a couple of days hopefully less

but rest assured, there gonna get whats coming to em[/quote]

what happened when u got DDosed gander is a big fat dumbass

item.source: Some Gofa fegging ddos'ed me from im guessing rs-server

item.title: Some Gofa fegging ddos'ed me from im guessing rs-server
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

I got a ddos from rs server. It was one brief attack and then the firewall blocked it. I couldn’t go online for a couple minutes, so I jjust disconnected my modem, restarted my computer, and then I turned on the modem and everything worked fine.

Hackers suck.

Hey what’s a “Gofa fegging”?

Read full topic

Its better to tell, if not your internet might get constantly attacked.
